line.originaltext: 1 (16 ounce) package baby carrots, sliced
line.annotation: create_ing(ing0, "1 (16 ounce) package baby carrots, sliced")

line.originaltext: 2 medium onions, sliced
1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese
3 tablespoons butter
3 tablespoons all-purpose flour
1 1/2 cups milk
1/2 teaspoon salt
1/8 teaspoon ground black pepper
1 tablespoon butter
1 cup fine dry bread crumbs
line.annotation: create_ing(ing9, "1 cup fine dry bread crumbs")

line.originaltext: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Place carrots and onions in a pot with enough lightly salted water to cover, and bring to a boil.
Place carrots and onions in a pot with enough lightly salted water to cover, and bring to a boil.
Place carrots and onions in a pot with enough lightly salted water to cover, and bring to a boil.
line.annotation: combine({ing10, ing11}, ing12, "carrots and onions and salty water", "enough water to cover")

line.originaltext: Place carrots and onions in a pot with enough lightly salted water to cover, and bring to a boil.
Place carrots and onions in a pot with enough lightly salted water to cover, and bring to a boil.
line.annotation: cook(ing12, t1, ing13, "boiling veggies", "bring to a boil")

line.originaltext: Cook 5 minutes, or until tender but firm.
Cook 5 minutes, or until tender but firm.
Drain, and spread 1/2 the carrots and onions in a baking dish.
Drain, and spread 1/2 the carrots and onions in a baking dish.
line.annotation: separate(ing16, ing17, "1/2 the carrots and onions", ing18, "1/2 the carrots and onions", "")

line.originaltext: Drain, and spread 1/2 the carrots and onions in a baking dish.
Drain, and spread 1/2 the carrots and onions in a baking dish.
Cover with 3/4 cup cheese, layer with remaining carrots and onions, and top with remaining cheese.
line.annotation: separate(ing2, ing19, "3/4 cup cheese", ing20, "1/4 cup cheese", "")

line.originaltext: Cover with 3/4 cup cheese, layer with remaining carrots and onions, and top with remaining cheese.
line.annotation: combine({ing18, ing19}, ing21, "cheese-covered veggies", "cover carrots and onions with cheese")

line.originaltext: Cover with 3/4 cup cheese, layer with remaining carrots and onions, and top with remaining cheese.
line.annotation: combine({ing17, ing21}, ing22, "cheese and veggies", "layer carrots and onions on top")

line.originaltext: Cover with 3/4 cup cheese, layer with remaining carrots and onions, and top with remaining cheese.
line.annotation: combine({ing20, ing22}, ing23, "cheese and veggies", "top with cheese")

line.originaltext: In a saucepan, melt 3 tablespoons butter and mix in flour until smooth.
In a saucepan, melt 3 tablespoons butter and mix in flour until smooth.
In a saucepan, melt 3 tablespoons butter and mix in flour until smooth.
In a saucepan, melt 3 tablespoons butter and mix in flour until smooth.
line.annotation: mix(ing25, t3, ing26, "butter flour mix", "until smooth")

line.originaltext: Gradually stir in milk until thickened, and season with salt and pepper.
line.annotation: combine({ing26, ing5}, ing27, "butter flour milk", "until thickened")

line.originaltext: Gradually stir in milk until thickened, and season with salt and pepper.
Pour over the carrots, onions, and cheese in the baking dish.
line.annotation: combine({ing23, ing28}, ing29, "au gratin mix", "pour over carrots, onions, and cheese")

line.originaltext: Melt 1 tablespoon butter in a small pot, and mix in bread crumbs.
Melt 1 tablespoon butter in a small pot, and mix in bread crumbs.
Melt 1 tablespoon butter in a small pot, and mix in bread crumbs.
Sprinkle evenly in the baking dish.
line.annotation: combine({ing29, ing31}, ing32, "carrots and onions au gratin", "sprinkle evenly")

line.originaltext: Bake 20 minutes in the preheated oven, or until bubbly and lightly browned.
line.annotation: cook(ing32, t0, ing33, "baked au gratin", "bake 20 minutes in the preheated oven")

line.originaltext: Bake 20 minutes in the preheated oven, or until bubbly and lightly browned.
Bake 20 minutes in the preheated oven, or until bubbly and lightly browned.
